name: Silverback
description:
Warning!!! You need to sideload it onto your quest using the SideQuest app!!! This Is multiplayer so play with your friends!!! (This is a pre-release, it may look different when the game fully releases.) A funny gorilla tag movement based game, about exploring the world around you

Patch Notes For v0.061

-Bug Fixes

-Fixed Colliders For Trees

-Fixed Slide Glitch (Yes there is a slide)

-Added More Trees

-Improved Performance

-Fixed Bug Where You Could Swim Like a Fish
